text:
Yuika...
Was it that you prefer tea over coffee...?

Boil some water~
And warm up the pot and cups too~...
I'll also prepare milk and sugar~

Welcome back, Yuika, thanks for shopping~
I've brewed some tea~! Please, have a seat~

I've also put cookies on a plate,
so please, help yourself~!

It's not a big deal at all~...
Sorry, and thank you, Kogatan.

While preparing, I thought, "Yuika really likes this kind
of thing". So getting ready was quite enjoyable~!
